core.title: Vaxx.nz
core.subtitle: Tagai i auala e faia ai tuipuipui i nofoaga latalata ane ia te oe.
core.disclaimerNotAGovWebsite: O lenei 'upega tafailagi e lei faia ele Malo. Ile faatinoina o tuipuipui asiasi ane ile upega tafailagi lea, <0>bookmyvaccine.nz</0>

locationModal.locationCTA: Tusi i lalo lou tuatusi poo le alalafaga
locationModal.useCurrentLocation: Fa'aoga le nofoaga o loo e nofo iai nei
locationModal.geolocationNotSupported: O nofoaga e le lagolagoina e le 'upega tafailagi

walkins.sectionHeader: Ulufale atu poo le tala'ao atu i lau ta'avale <0>- Matala ile as≈ç</0>

cancellationNotice.info: Faamolemole e aua le faia faalua se avanoa
cancellationNotice.message: Manatua ia faaleaogaina se avanoa pe afai sa faia muamua sou avanoa ile upega tafailagi lea <0>bookmyvaccine.nz</0>

noticeList.title: O avanoa ele mautinoa
noticeList.text: Ia manatua o nofoaga oloo taua ai le Ulufale atu iai, ele mautinoa le maua o ni avanoa.

walkins.driveThroughAvailable: <0 /> Avanoa pe a talaa'ao atu i lau ta'avale

otherLocations.sectionHeader: O isi nofoaga mo Tui <0>- Matala Le Aso nei</0>

disclaimer.title: O nofoaga nei sa tuuina mai e tagata ole Atunuu
disclaimer.message: I lenei auiliiliga atonu e le 100 pasene sona atoatoa. Fa'amolemole tagai ane ile nofoaga ile 'upega tafailagi.

howToBook.title: E faafefea ga faia avanoa
howToBook.stepOne: Sue se avanoa ma se taimi mai le lisi o i lalo.
howToBook.stepTwo: Kiliki le Faamauina lou avanoa button, e taitai atu oe ile itulau lea <0>bookmyvaccine.nz
howToBook.stepFour: Ole a fesiligia, e vaai se nofoaga ma se taimi e fetaui lelei ma oe.

modal.noBookingsAvailable: Leai ni avanoa o maua ile aso lenei :(
modal.backToCalendar: Toe foi i tua ile Kalena

footer.message: Afai sa fesoasoani lenei 'upega tafailagi mo oe, fa'amolemole faasoa atu i isi
